messages.subject: Welcome everyone!
messages.msgSnippet: Well, all lists start somewhere, so here we are.:) Thanks for helping me make a home for beginning unschoolers, where questions can be answered without a full
messages.messageBody:
Well, all lists start somewhere, so here we are.:)

Thanks for helping me make a home for beginning unschoolers, where
questions can be answered without a full blown dissection of how
each person posts.

My goal is to focus on unschooling, what unschooling days look like,
how unschooling affects all parts of our lives and exactly what the
philosophy IS. Natural learning is a fantastic journey, and I think
it's highly beneficial for people new to the idea,to be able to pick
the brains of those that have lived the lifestyle for many years.

Welcome! I look forward to making this a useful and enlightening
list.

Ren
